name: Winter Frenzy
description:
The purple thing outside the map is unintentionnal

(I forgot to remove it when copying some parts from another one of my games)

How to play :

To complete a level, kill all the wizards by dashing into them.

By moving around, you. gain snow which makes you bigger. The bigger you are, the more damage you deal.

Controls : 

Space - Dash 

WASD - Move
